BackstoryDef.title: Sith Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned in the perilous outer rim, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a unique connection to the Force. Discovered by a wandering Sith, [PAWN_pronoun] became an apprentice, mastering the dark side through survival and combat.

BackstoryDef.title: Sith Acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in the shadowed alleys of a Sith-controlled city, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up amidst deception and intrigue. Recognized for [PAWN_possessive] latent Force sensitivity, [PAWN_pronoun] was selected as an acolyte in the Sith Academy.

BackstoryDef.title: Freed Acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into slavery on a desolate world, [PAWN_nameDef] endured a life of oppression until discovered by a Sith Lord seeking potential acolytes. Gifted with latent Force sensitivity, [PAWN_pronoun] was taken from the chains of servitude and introduced to the ways of the dark side.

BackstoryDef.title: Sith Warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], once a formidable warrior on a distant Sith-controlled planet, rose through the ranks with unmatched ferocity. [PAWN_possessive] prowess in combat and unwavering loyalty caught the attention of Sith overlords, earning [PAWN_possessive] the title of Sith Warrior.

BackstoryDef.title: Sith Sorcerer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], once a scholar on distant Sith-controlled planet, delved into the forbidden arts of Sith sorcery. [PAWN_possessive] innate connection to the Force led [PAWN_possessive] to become a formidable Sith Sorcerer, mastering the esoteric and dark aspects of the ancient Sith traditions.

BackstoryDef.title: Sith Assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained in the deadly arts of assassination from a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] emerged as a silent and lethal force within the Sith Order. [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the art of stealth, infiltration, and the swift execution of targets, making [PAWN_possessive] a feared Sith Assassin.

BackstoryDef.title: Sith Lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the most fearsome of the Sith as they were the keepers of the Sith's greatest secrets and wielders of its most potent sorceries.

BackstoryDef.title: Lone Padawan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a young Jedi Padawan, trained in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant.[PAWN_nameDef]'s master was slain by a Sith Lord, and [PAWN_pronoun] barely escaped with [PAWN_possessive] life. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] roams the rimworld, haunted by the memory of [PAWN_possessive] master's death. [PAWN_pronoun] seeks to complete [PAWN_possessive] training, mastering the ways of the Force and seeking vengeance against the Sith who took everything away.

BackstoryDef.title: Promising Padawan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained as a Jedi Padawan on the serene world of Coruscant, [PAWN_nameDef] embodied the principles of peace and harmony. [PAWN_possessive] connection to the Force marked [PAWN_possessive] as a promising student.

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Padawan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hailing from the serene world of Naboo, [PAWN_nameDef] was identified as a Force-sensitive child and taken into the Jedi Order. Trained as a Jedi Padawan, [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in the arts of diplomacy and healing, embodying the Jedi ideals of compassion and serenity.

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had completed their Jedi training as a student in the Jedi academy, in addition to one-on-one training as a Padawan and the completion of the Jedi Trials.

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained as a Jedi Sentinel on the distant world of Dantooine, Arius Shadewalker honed his skills in the delicate balance between combat and diplomacy. His mastery of the Force and proficiency with a lightsaber marked him as a versatile and formidable Jedi

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had completed their Jedi training as a student in the Jedi academy, in addition to one-on-one training as a Padawan and the completion of the Jedi Trials.

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Consular
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had completed their Jedi training as a student in the Jedi academy, in addition to one-on-one training as a Padawan and the completion of the Jedi Trials.

BackstoryDef.title: Jedi Master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]showed great understanding of the Force and managed to instruct a Padawan and train them successfully to the level of a Jedi Knight

BackstoryDef.title: Redeemed Sith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], once an unwavering follower of the dark side, found redemption after witnessing the devastating consequences of [PAWN_possessive] actions. Formerly known as Darth [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] abandoned the Sith Order and sought to make amends for the pain [PAWN_pronoun] had inflicted.

BackstoryDef.title: Fallen Jedi
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once a noble Jedi Knight, [PAWN_nameDef] succumbed to the allure of the dark side, forsaking the Jedi Code. Betrayed by [PAWN_possessive] own inner struggles, [PAWN_pronoun] became a fallen Jedi, embracing the power of the Sith to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] newfound desires for strength and dominance.
